channel.title: [Delta] Overloads [317]

item.title: [Delta] Overloads [317]
item.dc:creator: @Pblord7 Pblord7
item.description:
@Pblord7 wrote:

Can someone help me finish/improve these? It works fine, but it takes a good 1.5 minutes to loads them


case 2438: // overload
if (System.currentTimeMillis() -c.potionDelay < 2000)
return;
c.foodDelay = System.currentTimeMillis();
c.potionDelay = System.currentTimeMillis();
c.attPot = true;
c.attPotTimer = 20;
c.abc = c.getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[0]);
c.defPot = true;
c.defPotTimer = 20;
c.abc = c.getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[1]);
c.strPot = true;
c.strPotTimer = 20;
c.abc = c.getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[2]);
c.cba = c.abc / 10;
c.abc2 = c.cba * 2;
if (c.abc2 <= 1) {
c.abc2 = 2;
}
c.setAnimation(829);
c.playerLevel[0] = c.getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[0]);
c.playerLevel[0] += c.abc2;
c.sendFrame126(""+c.playerLevel[0]+"", 4004);
c.playerLevel[1] = c.getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[1]);
c.playerLevel[1] += c.abc2;
c.sendFrame126(""+c.playerLevel[1]+"", 4004);
c.playerLevel[2] = c.getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[2]);
c.playerLevel[2] += c.abc2;
c.sendFrame126(""+c.playerLevel[2]+"", 4004);
c.playerLevel[3] = c.getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[3]);
c.playerLevel[3] += c.abc2;
c.sendFrame126(""+c.playerLevel[3]+"", 4004);
c.playerLevel[4] = c.getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[4]);
c.playerLevel[4] += c.abc2;
c.sendFrame126(""+c.playerLevel[4]+"", 4004);
c.playerLevel[5] = c.getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[5]);
c.playerLevel[5] += c.abc2;
c.sendFrame126(""+c.playerLevel[6]+"", 4004);
c.playerLevel[6] = c.getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[6]);
c.playerLevel[6] += c.abc2;
c.sendFrame126(""+c.playerLevel[6]+"", 4004);
c.deleteItem(2438, slot, 1);
c.addItem(229, 1);
c.updateRequired = true;
c.appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
c.attPotTimer = 60;
				c.sM("You drink some of your overload potion.");
				c.sM("You have finished your potion.");
break;
